# Local KaTeX fallback assets

The files in this directory are lightweight fallbacks so the site can degrade gracefully if the KaTeX CDN is unreachable.

For full local rendering, replace these placeholders with real KaTeX v0.16.9 distribution files:

- `katex.min.css`
- `katex.min.js`
- `auto-render.min.js`

Suggested source:

- `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/katex@0.16.9/dist/katex.min.css`
- `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/katex@0.16.9/dist/katex.min.js`
- `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/katex@0.16.9/dist/contrib/auto-render.min.js`
